Speaker.name: Waiter
Speaker.line1: (Nice cane.)
Speaker.line2: (Hope I don't need one after this mission.)
Speaker.line3: (Wonder what caused her to use it. Age? Injury?)

Speaker.name: Martha_Normal
Speaker.line1: You seem to be interested in my cane, dear.

Speaker.name: Waiter
Speaker.line1: I must admit, it is indeed a beautiful cane.

Speaker.name: Waiter
Speaker.line1: Oh, I did not, ma'am.

Speaker.name: Martha_Normal
Speaker.line1: When your leg doesn't work as well as before,

Speaker.name: Martha_Happy
Speaker.line1: having a beautiful cane adds a touch of elegance to each step.

Speaker.name: Martha_Normal
Speaker.line1: Oh, my apologies, dear.

Speaker.name: Martha_Happy
Speaker.line1: Never mind, then.

Speaker.name: Martha_Normal
Speaker.line1: Thanks to this cane, I can still bring myself to wherever I need to.

Speaker.name: Waiter
Speaker.line1: If there is anything I can do to make your journey more comfortable,
Speaker.line2: please let me know right away.

Speaker.name: Waiter
Speaker.line1: That is good to know, ma'am.

Speaker.name: Martha_Happy
Speaker.line1: Thank you, dear.

Speaker.name: Martha_Happy
Speaker.line1: I appreciate that.

Speaker.name: Martha_Sad
Speaker.line1: It was... a %tragic% %accident,% you know.

Speaker.name: Martha_Normal
Speaker.line3: Promise me you will stay as a gentleman.

Speaker.name: Martha_Normal
Speaker.line1: Do not make the same horrible mistake like my former husband did.

Speaker.name: Waiter
Speaker.line1: Ma'am... I am so sorry to hear that.

Speaker.name: Waiter
Speaker.line1: I promise, ma'am.

Speaker.name: Martha_Normal
Speaker.line1: Thank you, dear.
Speaker.line2: It means a lot to me. More than you will ever know.

Speaker.name: Martha_Happy
Speaker.line1: Oh, dear, I do tend to get carried away reminiscing.
Speaker.line2: Let's move on to a different topic, shall we?

Speaker.name: Martha_Normal
Speaker.line1: Oh, dear, I do tend to get carried away reminiscing.

Speaker.name: Martha_Happy
Speaker.line1: My apologies if I've gone over a bit.
Speaker.line2: Let's move on to a different topic, shall we?

Speaker.name: Martha_Normal
Speaker.line1: Apart from my injury, my back has also been acting up lately.
Speaker.line2: It does make traveling for long periods quite challenging.

Speaker.name: Martha_Normal
Speaker.line1: However, this time is different; it's very important.

Speaker.name: Martha_Shy
Speaker.line1: There are matters of the heart awaiting me at Westside.
Speaker.line2: Finally, we will get to meet in person.

Speaker.name: Martha_Happy
Speaker.line1: The excitement is getting the best of me.
Speaker.line2: I can't wait to see her face anymore.

Speaker.name: Martha_Normal
Speaker.line1: Talking about delightful thing...

Speaker.name: Martha_Normal
Speaker.line1: That sandwich you've served me.
Speaker.line2: It looks like the one from that famous little shop,
Speaker.line3: back in the National Day celebration.

Speaker.name: Martha_Happy
Speaker.line1: I couldn't buy it as it sold out, but I bet yours will taste as good.

Speaker.name: Martha_Normal
Speaker.line1: Talking about Nation Day Event, I saw a weird cult praising some Westside god.
Speaker.line2: It seems like one of their leading lady is on this train.
Speaker.line3: You need to be careful, dear.
